about_the_game:
Are you ready to walk "The Hunter's Path" and prove yourself against the wild? Sharpen your instincts, load your weapons, and embark on the ultimate survival hunting adventure.

This is our demo for The Hunter's Path.  It includes a tutorial scenario and a timed open world survival scenario.  Additional scenarios will be included in the game's full release.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 SP1
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 SP1
  • Processor: Intel i5 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Survive. Hunt. Thrive. In "The Hunter's Path," immerse yourself in a top-down survival hunting game. Navigate through the terrain, stalk your prey, and craft your needed supplies.
